valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 31 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 1 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Developing low expected Norwegian Sea 981 by midnight tonight. High Malin 1038 dissipating
